description: CAPACITY BUILDING OF THE HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION OF SIERRA LEONE (HRCSL)

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description: The project  aims to constitute a strong and functioning Human Rights Commission of Sierra Leone capable of carrying out its institutional function of promoting and protecting human rights and thereby creating a strong culture of respect for human rights and good governance in Sierra Leone
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: PBF- Capacity Building HRCSL

title: PBF- CAPACITY BUILDING OF HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION OF SL
